question: The Mundra Thermal Power Station (MTPS) is located in which state?
explanation: The Mundra Thermal Power Station is located at Mundra in Kutch district of Gujarat. The power plant is one of the coal-based power plants of Adani Power. The source of water for the power plant is sea water from the Gulf of Kutch. It is the world\'s 11th-largest single location coal-based thermal power plant as well as India\'s second largest operational power plant.
